title: Bug 17703: Inconsistent Task Action Dialog
description: When selecting a CU in the packages view and executing 'File > Add Task,' a different dialog appears compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
OB: When selecting a CU in the packages view and executing 'File > Add Task,' a different dialog appears compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
EB: The 'File > Add Task' action in the packages view should use the same dialog as when executed from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
SR:
1. Open the packages view.
2. Select a CU.
3. Execute 'File > Add Task.'
4. Note the dialog appearance.
5. Open a Java file in the editor.
6. Use the ruler context menu to execute 'Add Task.'
7. Compare the dialogs between steps 3 and 6.
